title: Caster
notes: Game runs and does not crash, but the main character can get stuck in the falling animation after jumping, causing him to never land on the ground. The first two times it corrected itself after jumping again, but the third time it persisted and I was not able to find a way to cancel the glitch.
same bug as in the windows version - stuck in the ground and only able to jump around
title: Caster

notes: Game runs just fine, but there are several issues with the gameplay that I can't say for sure if they are related to SteamPlay/Proton or just vanilla game bugs. In the tutorial level I have to get within point-blank range to shoot the white orbs containing the attack drops. When I finally do blow them up, I collect the drops but they don't add the new attack types to my player, leaving me stuck with only the initial attack. After the tutorial level, it becomes common for the character to get stuck in the ground, leaving me with no option but to jump around to get around. I've never played this native, so I don't know if these are common issues with the game or not.
title: Caster
